trans-unit.source: Specifies values for navigating among accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用於在可存取物件中巡覽的數值。

trans-unit.source: Accessible navigation directions are either spatial (up, down, left, and right) or logical (first child, last child, next, and previous).
trans-unit.target: 可存取的巡覽方向不是空間 （最多、 下、 左和右） 或邏輯 （第一個子系，最後一個子系下, 一步] 和 [上一個）。

trans-unit.source: Logical directions are used when clients navigate from one user interface element to another within the same container.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端從一個使用者介面項目瀏覽至另一個相同容器中時，會使用邏輯方向。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> uses this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> 使用這個列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the accessibility application, search for the "Microsoft Active Accessibility" topic in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關協助工具應用程式的詳細資訊，請搜尋 MSDN library 中的 「 Microsoft Active Accessibility 」 主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>類別會公開可存取的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: Since the chart legend is not an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 因為圖表圖例不是實際<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A>方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> enumeration with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation>列舉型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Navigate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to a sibling object located below the starting object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到位在開始物件下的同層級 (Sibling) 物件。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to the first child of the object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到物件的第一個子系。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to the last child of the object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到物件的最後一個子系。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to the sibling object located to the left of the starting object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到位在開始物件左方的同層級物件。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to the next logical object, typically from a sibling object to the starting object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到下一個邏輯物件，一般是從同層級物件巡覽到開始的物件。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to the previous logical object, typically from a sibling object to the starting object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到上一個邏輯物件，一般是從同層級物件巡覽到開始的物件。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to the sibling object located to the right of the starting object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到位在開始物件右方的同層級物件。

trans-unit.source: Navigation to a sibling object located above the starting object.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽到位在開始物件上方的同層級物件。
